Name: Ninja Creator
About the game: Want to create your own ninja? Now you can with the ninja creator! Choose from tons of cool outfits and hairstyles to create the ninja warrior or assassin of your dreams! Features 7 Cool Outfits 8 Sharp Hairstyles 10 Different facial expressions Saving your character as a transparent .PNG image
